00279 UINT32      SaveLoadScreenInit()
00280 {
00281       //Set so next time we come in, we can set up
00282       gfSaveLoadScreenEntry = TRUE;
00283 
00284       memset( gbSaveGameArray, -1, NUM_SAVE_GAMES);
00285 
00286       ClearSelectedSaveSlot();
00287 
00288       gbHighLightedLocation=-1;
00289 
00290 
00291 
00292       return( TRUE );
00293 }
00294 
00295 
00296 
00297 UINT32      SaveLoadScreenHandle()
00298 {
00299       StartFrameBufferRender();
00300 
00301       if( gfSaveLoadScreenEntry )
00302       {
00303             EnterSaveLoadScreen();
00304             gfSaveLoadScreenEntry = FALSE;
00305             gfSaveLoadScreenExit = FALSE;
00306 
00307             PauseGame();
00308 
00309             //save the new rect
00310             BlitBufferToBuffer(guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00311       }
00312 
00313       RestoreBackgroundRects();
00314 
00315       //to guarentee that we do not accept input when we are fading out
00316       if( !gfStartedFadingOut )
00317       {
00318             GetSaveLoadScreenUserInput();
00319       }
00320       else
00321             gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = FALSE;
00322 
00323       //if we have exited the save load screen, exit
00324       if( !gfSaveLoadScreenButtonsCreated )
00325             return( guiSaveLoadExitScreen );
00326 
00327       RenderAllTextFields();
00328 
00329       HandleSaveLoadScreen();
00330 
00331       if( gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen )
00332       {
00333             RenderSaveLoadScreen();
00334             MarkButtonsDirty( );
00335             RenderButtons();
00336 
00337             gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = FALSE;
00338       }
00339 
00340       if( gubSaveGameNextPass != 0 )
00341       {
00342             gubSaveGameNextPass++;
00343 
00344             if( gubSaveGameNextPass == 5 )
00345             {
00346                   gubSaveGameNextPass = 0;
00347                   SaveLoadGameNumber( gbSelectedSaveLocation );
00348             }
00349       }
00350 
00351 
00352       //If we are not exiting the screen, render the buttons
00353       if( !gfSaveLoadScreenExit && guiSaveLoadExitScreen == SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN )
00354       {
00355             // render buttons marked dirty      
00356             RenderButtons( ); 
00357       }
00358 
00359 
00360       // ATE: Put here to save RECTS before any fast help being drawn...
00361       SaveBackgroundRects( );
00362       RenderButtonsFastHelp();
00363 
00364       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue( );
00365       EndFrameBufferRender( );
00366 
00367       if ( HandleFadeOutCallback( ) )
00368       {
00369             return( guiSaveLoadExitScreen );
00370       }
00371 
00372       if ( HandleBeginFadeOut( SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN ) )
00373       {
00374             return( SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN );
00375       }
00376 
00377 
00378       if( gfSaveLoadScreenExit )
00379       {
00380             ExitSaveLoadScreen();
00381       }
00382 
00383       if ( HandleFadeInCallback( ) )
00384       {
00385             // Re-render the scene!
00386             RenderSaveLoadScreen();
00387       }
00388 
00389       if ( HandleBeginFadeIn( SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN ) )
00390       {
00391       }
00392 
00393       return( guiSaveLoadExitScreen );
00394 }
00395

00398 UINT32      SaveLoadScreenShutdown()
00399 {
00400 
00401       return( TRUE );
00402 }

00414 void SetSaveLoadExitScreen( UINT32 uiScreen )
00415 {
00416       if( uiScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00417       {
00418             EnterTacticalScreen( );
00419       }
00420 
00421       //If we are currently in the Message box loop
00422 //    if( gfExitAfterMessageBox )
00423 //          ExitSaveLoadScreen();
00424 
00425 
00426       gfSaveLoadScreenExit    = TRUE;
00427 
00428       guiSaveLoadExitScreen = uiScreen;
00429 
00430       SetPendingNewScreen( uiScreen );
00431 
00432       if( gfDoingQuickLoad )
00433       {
00434             fFirstTimeInGameScreen = TRUE;
00435             SetPendingNewScreen( uiScreen );
00436       }
00437 
00438       ExitSaveLoadScreen();
00439 
00440       DestroySaveLoadTextInputBoxes();
00441 }

00444 
00445 BOOLEAN           EnterSaveLoadScreen()
00446 {
00447       INT8  i;
00448   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00449       UINT16 usPosX = SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_X;
00450       UINT16 usPosY = SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_Y;
00451       
00452       // WANNE <do not draw the background black>
00453       // Black background
00454       //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, 0 );
00455 
00456 //    if( guiPreviousOptionScreen != MAINMENU_SCREEN )
00457 //          gbSetSlotToBeSelected = -1;
00458 
00459       // This is a hack to get sector names , but... if the underground sector is NOT loaded
00460       if( !gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead )
00461       {
00462             BuildUndergroundSectorInfoList();
00463             gfHadToMakeBasementLevels = TRUE;
00464       }
00465       else
00466       {
00467             gfHadToMakeBasementLevels = FALSE;
00468       }
00469 
00470       guiSaveLoadExitScreen = SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN;
00471       //init the list
00472       InitSaveGameArray();
00473 
00474       //Clear out all the saved background rects
00475       EmptyBackgroundRects( );
00476 
00477       //if the user has asked to load the selected save
00478       if( gfLoadGameUponEntry )
00479       {
00480             //make sure the save is valid
00481             if( gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot != -1 && gbSaveGameArray[ gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot ] )
00482             {     
00483                    gbSelectedSaveLocation = gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot;
00484 
00485                   //load the saved game
00486                   ConfirmLoadSavedGameMessageBoxCallBack( MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES );
00487             }
00488             else 
00489             { //else the save isnt valid, so dont load it
00490                   gfLoadGameUponEntry = FALSE;
00491             }
00492       }
00493 
00494       // load Main background  graphic and add it
00495       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00496       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\LoadScreen.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00497       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSlgBackGroundImage));
00498 
00499       // load Load Screen Add ons graphic and add it
00500       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00501       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_LOADSAVEHEADER );
00502       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBackGroundAddOns));
00503 
00504 
00505       guiSlgButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("INTERFACE\\LoadScreenAddOns.sti", -1,6,-1,9,-1 );
00506 //    guiSlgButtonImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiBackGroundAddOns, -1,9,-1,6,-1 );
00507 
00508 
00509       //Cancel button
00510 //    if( gfSaveGame )
00511 //          usPosX = SLG_SAVE_CANCEL_POS_X;
00512 //    else
00513             usPosX = SLG_LOAD_CANCEL_POS_X;
00514 
00515       guiSlgCancelBtn = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiSlgButtonImage, zSaveLoadText[SLG_CANCEL], OPT_BUTTON_FONT, 
00516                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00517                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00518                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00519                                                                                usPosX, SLG_CANCEL_POS_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00520                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSlgCancelCallback );
00521 
00522 
00523       //Either the save or load button
00524       if( gfSaveGame )
00525       {
00526 
00527             //If we are saving, dont have the save game button
00528             guiSaveLoadImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiSlgButtonImage, -1,5,-1,8,-1 );
00529 
00530             guiSlgSaveLoadBtn = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiSaveLoadImage, zSaveLoadText[SLG_SAVE_GAME], OPT_BUTTON_FONT, 
00531                                                                                      OPT_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00532                                                                                      OPT_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00533                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00534                                                                                      SLG_SAVE_LOAD_BTN_POS_X, SLG_SAVE_LOAD_BTN_POS_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00535                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSlgSaveLoadCallback );
00536 
00537       }
00538       else
00539       {
00540             guiSaveLoadImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiSlgButtonImage, -1,4,-1,7,-1 );
00541 
00542             guiSlgSaveLoadBtn = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiSaveLoadImage, zSaveLoadText[SLG_LOAD_GAME], OPT_BUTTON_FONT, 
00543                                                                                      OPT_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00544                                                                                      OPT_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00545                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00546                                                                                      SLG_SAVE_LOAD_BTN_POS_X, SLG_SAVE_LOAD_BTN_POS_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00547                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSlgSaveLoadCallback );
00548       }
00549 
00550       //if we are loading, disable the load button
00551 //    if( !gfSaveGame )
00552       {
00553             SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn, DISABLED_STYLE_HATCHED );
00554 
00555             if( gbSetSlotToBeSelected == -1 )
00556                   DisableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
00557       }
00558 
00559 
00560       usPosX = SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_X;
00561       usPosY = SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_Y;
00562       for(i=0; i<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; i++)
00563       {
00564             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedSaveRegion[i], usPosX, usPosY, (UINT16)(usPosX+SLG_SAVELOCATION_WIDTH), (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_SAVELOCATION_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00565                                                  CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectedSaveRegionMovementCallBack, SelectedSaveRegionCallBack ); 
00566             MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedSaveRegion[i]); 
00567             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedSaveRegion[ i ], 0, i);
00568 
00569 
00570             //if we are to Load a game
00571             if( !gfSaveGame )
00572             {
00573                   //We cannot load a game that hasnt been saved
00574                   if( !gbSaveGameArray[ i ] )
00575                         MSYS_DisableRegion( &gSelectedSaveRegion[ i ] );
00576             }
00577 
00578             usPosY += SLG_GAP_BETWEEN_LOCATIONS;
00579       }
00580 
00581 /*
00582 Removed so that the user can click on it and get displayed a message that the quick save slot is for the tactical screen
00583       if( gfSaveGame )
00584       {
00585             MSYS_DisableRegion( &gSelectedSaveRegion[0] );
00586       }
00587 */
00588 
00589       //Create the screen mask to enable ability to righ click to cancel the sace game
00590       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSLSEntireScreenRegion, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH , SCREEN_HEIGHT , MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH-10,
00591                                            CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectedSLSEntireRegionCallBack ); 
00592       MSYS_AddRegion(&gSLSEntireScreenRegion); 
00593 
00594 
00595       //Reset the regions
00596 //    for( i=0; i<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; i++)
00597 //          gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[i] = SLG_UNSELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
00598 //    gbSelectedSaveLocation=-1;
00599       ClearSelectedSaveSlot();
00600 
00601 
00602       //Remove the mouse region over the clock
00603       RemoveMouseRegionForPauseOfClock(  );
00604 
00605       //Draw the screen
00606 //    gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;      DEF:
00607 
00608       //Reset the highlight
00609       gbHighLightedLocation = -1;
00610 
00611       gzGameDescTextField[0] = '\0';
00612 
00613 
00614 
00615       //if we are loading
00616 //    if( !gfSaveGame )
00617       {
00618             SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn, DISABLED_STYLE_HATCHED );
00619 
00620             //if the last saved game slot is ok, set the selected slot to the last saved slot]
00621             if( gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot != -1 )
00622             {
00623                   //if the slot is valid
00624                   if( gbSaveGameArray[ gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot ] )
00625                   {
00626                         SAVED_GAME_HEADER SaveGameHeader;
00627 
00628                         memset( &SaveGameHeader, 0, sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ) );
00629 
00630                         //if it is not the Quick Save slot, and we are loading
00631                         if( !gfSaveGame || gfSaveGame && gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot != 0 )
00632                         {
00633                               gbSelectedSaveLocation = gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot;
00634                               gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ gbSelectedSaveLocation ] = SLG_SELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
00635 
00636                               //load the save gamed header string
00637 
00638                               //Get the heade for the saved game
00639                               if( !LoadSavedGameHeader( gbSelectedSaveLocation, &SaveGameHeader ) )
00640                               {
00641                                     memset( &SaveGameHeader, 0, sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ) );
00642                                     gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ gbSelectedSaveLocation ] = SLG_UNSELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
00643                                     gbSaveGameArray[ gbSelectedSaveLocation ] = FALSE;
00644                                     gbSelectedSaveLocation = gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot = -1;
00645                               }
00646 
00647                               wcscpy( gzGameDescTextField, SaveGameHeader.sSavedGameDesc );
00648                         }
00649                   }
00650             }
00651 
00652             //if we are loading and the there is no slot selected
00653             if( gbSelectedSaveLocation == -1 )
00654                   DisableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
00655             else
00656                   EnableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
00657       }
00658 
00659 
00660 /*    
00661       if( gbSetSlotToBeSelected != -1 )
00662       {
00663             gbSelectedSaveLocation = gbSetSlotToBeSelected;
00664             gbSetSlotToBeSelected = -1;
00665 
00666             //Set the selected slot background graphic
00667             gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ gbSelectedSaveLocation ] = SLG_SELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
00668       }
00669 */
00670 
00671 
00672       RenderSaveLoadScreen();
00673 
00674       // Save load buttons are created
00675       gfSaveLoadScreenButtonsCreated = TRUE;
00676 
00677       gfDoingQuickLoad = FALSE;
00678 
00679       //reset
00680       gfStartedFadingOut = FALSE;
00681 
00682       DisableScrollMessages();
00683 
00684       gfLoadedGame = FALSE;
00685 
00686       if( gfLoadGameUponEntry )
00687       {
00688             UINT32                                                             uiDestPitchBYTES;
00689             UINT8                                                              *pDestBuf;
00690 
00691             //unmark the 2 buttons from being dirty
00692             ButtonList[ guiSlgCancelBtn ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
00693             ButtonList[ guiSlgSaveLoadBtn ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
00694 
00695 
00696             // CLEAR THE FRAME BUFFER
00697             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00698             memset(pDestBuf, 0, SCREEN_HEIGHT * uiDestPitchBYTES );
00699             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00700 
00701             // CLEAR THE guiRENDERBUFFER
00702             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( guiRENDERBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00703             memset(pDestBuf, 0, SCREEN_HEIGHT * uiDestPitchBYTES );
00704             UnLockVideoSurface( guiRENDERBUFFER );
00705       }
00706 
00707       gfGettingNameFromSaveLoadScreen = FALSE;
00708 
00709       return( TRUE );
00710 }
00711 
00712 
00713 void              ExitSaveLoadScreen()
00714 {
00715       INT8  i;
00716 
00717 
00718       gfLoadGameUponEntry = FALSE;
00719 
00720       if( !gfSaveLoadScreenButtonsCreated )
00721             return;
00722 
00723       gfSaveLoadScreenExit = FALSE;
00724       gfSaveLoadScreenEntry = TRUE;
00725       gfExitAfterMessageBox = FALSE;
00726 
00727 
00728       UnloadButtonImage( guiSlgButtonImage );
00729 
00730       RemoveButton( guiSlgCancelBtn );
00731 
00732       //Remove the save / load button
00733 //    if( !gfSaveGame )
00734       {
00735             RemoveButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
00736             UnloadButtonImage( guiSaveLoadImage );
00737       }
00738 
00739       for(i=0; i<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; i++)
00740       {
00741         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedSaveRegion[i]);
00742       }
00743 
00744       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSlgBackGroundImage );
00745       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBackGroundAddOns );
00746 
00747       //Destroy the text fields ( if created )
00748       DestroySaveLoadTextInputBoxes();
00749 
00750   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSLSEntireScreenRegion );
00751 
00752       gfSaveLoadScreenEntry = TRUE;
00753       gfSaveLoadScreenExit = FALSE;
00754 
00755       if( !gfLoadedGame )
00756       {
00757             UnLockPauseState( );
00758             UnPauseGame();
00759       }
00760 
00761       gfSaveLoadScreenButtonsCreated = FALSE;
00762 
00763       gfCameDirectlyFromGame = FALSE;
00764 
00765       //unload the basement sectors
00766       if( gfHadToMakeBasementLevels )
00767             TrashUndergroundSectorInfo();
00768 
00769       gfGettingNameFromSaveLoadScreen = FALSE;
00770 }
00771 
00772 
00773 void              RenderSaveLoadScreen()
00774 {
00775   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00776 
00777       //if we are going to be instantly leaving the screen, dont draw the numbers
00778       if( gfLoadGameUponEntry )
00779       {
00780             return;
00781       }
00782 
00783       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiSlgBackGroundImage);
00784   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00785 
00786       if( gfSaveGame )
00787       {
00788             // If we are saving a game
00789 
00790             //Display the Title
00791 //          DrawTextToScreen( zSaveLoadText[SLG_SAVE_GAME], 0, 10, 639, SAVE_LOAD_TITLE_FONT, SAVE_LOAD_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED   );
00792             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBackGroundAddOns);
00793             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 1, SLG_TITLE_POS_X, SLG_TITLE_POS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00794       }
00795       else
00796       {
00797             // If we are Loading a game
00798 
00799             //Display the Title
00800             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBackGroundAddOns);
00801             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, SLG_TITLE_POS_X, SLG_TITLE_POS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00802 
00803       }
00804 
00805       DisplaySaveGameList();
00806 
00807       InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH  , SCREEN_HEIGHT  );
00808 }

00811 
00812 void              HandleSaveLoadScreen()
00813 {
00814       //If the game failed when in a message box, pop up a message box stating this
00815       if( gfFailedToSaveGameWhenInsideAMessageBox )
00816       {
00817             gfFailedToSaveGameWhenInsideAMessageBox = FALSE;
00818 
00819             DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_SAVE_GAME_ERROR], SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, RedrawSaveLoadScreenAfterMessageBox );
00820 
00821 //          gbSelectedSaveLocation = -1;
00822             gbHighLightedLocation=-1;
00823 
00824 //          for( i=0; i<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; i++)
00825 //                gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[i] = SLG_UNSELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
00826             ClearSelectedSaveSlot();
00827 
00828       }
00829 }

00832 
00833 
00834 void        GetSaveLoadScreenUserInput()
00835 {
00836       InputAtom Event;
00837       POINT  MousePos;
00838       INT8        bActiveTextField;
00839       static BOOLEAN    fWasCtrlHeldDownLastFrame = FALSE;
00840 
00841       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
00842 
00843       //if we are going to be instantly leaving the screen, dont draw the numbers
00844       if( gfLoadGameUponEntry )
00845       {
00846             return;
00847       }
00848 
00849 
00850       if( gfKeyState[ ALT ] )
00851       {
00852             DisplayOnScreenNumber( FALSE );
00853       }
00854       else
00855       {
00856             DisplayOnScreenNumber( TRUE );
00857       }
00858 
00859       if( gfKeyState[ CTRL ] || fWasCtrlHeldDownLastFrame )
00860       {
00861             DisplaySaveGameEntry( gbSelectedSaveLocation );
00862       }
00863 
00864       fWasCtrlHeldDownLastFrame = gfKeyState[ CTRL ];
00865 
00866       while( DequeueEvent( &Event ) )
00867       {
00868             // HOOK INTO MOUSE HOOKS
00869             switch( Event.usEvent)
00870         {
00871                   case LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00872                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00873                         break;
00874                   case LEFT_BUTTON_UP:
00875                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y ,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);               
00876                         break;
00877                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00878                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00879                         break;
00880                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_UP: 
00881                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);   
00882                         break;
00883                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
00884                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                 
00885                         break;
00886                   case LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
00887                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                        
00888                         break;
00889             }
00890 
00891             if( !HandleTextInput( &Event ) && Event.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
00892             {
00893                   switch( Event.usParam )
00894                   {
00895                         case '1':
00896                               SetSelection( 1 );
00897                               break;
00898                         case '2':
00899                               SetSelection( 2 );
00900                               break;
00901                         case '3':
00902                               SetSelection( 3 );
00903                               break;
00904                         case '4':
00905                               SetSelection( 4 );
00906                               break;
00907                         case '5':
00908                               SetSelection( 5 );
00909                               break;
00910                         case '6':
00911                               SetSelection( 6 );
00912                               break;
00913                         case '7':
00914                               SetSelection( 7 );
00915                               break;
00916                         case '8':
00917                               SetSelection( 8 );
00918                               break;
00919                         case '9':
00920                               SetSelection( 9 );
00921                               break;
00922                         case '0':
00923                               SetSelection( 10 );
00924                               break;
00925                   }
00926             }
00927 
00928             if( Event.usEvent == KEY_UP )
00929             {
00930                   switch( Event.usParam )
00931                   {
00932                         case 'a':
00933                               if( gfKeyState[ ALT ] && !gfSaveGame )
00934                               {
00935                                     INT8 iFile = GetNumberForAutoSave( TRUE );
00936 
00937                                     if( iFile == -1 )
00938                                           break;
00939 
00940                                     guiLastSaveGameNum = iFile;
00941 
00942                                     gbSelectedSaveLocation = SAVE__END_TURN_NUM;
00943                                     StartFadeOutForSaveLoadScreen();
00944                               }
00945                               break;
00946 
00947                         case 'b':
00948                               if( gfKeyState[ ALT ] && !gfSaveGame )
00949                               {
00950                                     INT8 iFile = GetNumberForAutoSave( FALSE );
00951 
00952                                     if( iFile == -1 )
00953                                           break;
00954                                     else if( iFile == 0 )
00955                                           guiLastSaveGameNum = 1;
00956                                     else if( iFile == 1 )
00957                                           guiLastSaveGameNum = 0;
00958 
00959                                     gbSelectedSaveLocation = SAVE__END_TURN_NUM;
00960                                     StartFadeOutForSaveLoadScreen();
00961                               }
00962                               break;
00963 
00964                         case UPARROW:
00965                               MoveSelectionUpOrDown( TRUE );
00966                               break;
00967 
00968                         case DNARROW:
00969                               MoveSelectionUpOrDown( FALSE );
00970                               break;
00971 
00972                         case ESC:
00973                               if( gbSelectedSaveLocation == -1 )
00974                               {
00975 
00976                                     if(   gfCameDirectlyFromGame )
00977                                           SetSaveLoadExitScreen( guiPreviousOptionScreen );
00978 
00979                                     else if( guiPreviousOptionScreen == MAINMENU_SCREEN )
00980                                           SetSaveLoadExitScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
00981                                     else
00982                                           SetSaveLoadExitScreen( OPTIONS_SCREEN );
00983                               }
00984                               else
00985                               {
00986                                     //Reset the selected slot background graphic
00987                                     gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ gbSelectedSaveLocation ] = SLG_UNSELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
00988 
00989                                     //reset selected slot
00990                                     gbSelectedSaveLocation = -1;
00991                                     gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;
00992                                     DestroySaveLoadTextInputBoxes();
00993 
00994 //                                  if( !gfSaveGame )
00995                                           DisableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
00996                               }
00997                               break;
00998 
00999 
01000                         case ENTER:
01001 
01002                               if( gfSaveGame )
01003                               {
01004                                     bActiveTextField = (INT8)GetActiveFieldID();
01005                                     if( bActiveTextField && bActiveTextField != -1 )
01006                                     {
01007                                           Get16BitStringFromField( (UINT8)bActiveTextField, gzGameDescTextField);
01008                                           SetActiveField(0);
01009 
01010                                           DestroySaveLoadTextInputBoxes();
01011 
01012                                           SaveLoadGameNumber( gbSelectedSaveLocation );
01013                                           return;
01014                                     }
01015                                     else
01016                                     {
01017                                           if( gbSelectedSaveLocation != -1 )
01018                                           {
01019                                                 SaveLoadGameNumber( gbSelectedSaveLocation );
01020                                                 return;
01021                                           }
01022                                     }
01023                                     //Enable the save/load button
01024                                     if( gbSelectedSaveLocation != -1 )
01025                                           if( !gfSaveGame )
01026                                                 EnableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
01027 
01028                                     gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;
01029                               }
01030                               else
01031                                     SaveLoadGameNumber( gbSelectedSaveLocation );
01032 
01033                               break;
01034                   }
01035             }
01036       }
01037 }
01038 
01039 void SaveLoadGameNumber( INT8 bSaveGameID )
01040 {
01041 //    CHAR16      zTemp[128];
01042       UINT8       ubRetVal=0;
01043 
01044       if( bSaveGameID >= NUM_SAVE_GAMES || bSaveGameID < 0 )
01045       {
01046             return;
01047       }
01048 
01049       if( gfSaveGame )
01050       {
01051             INT8        bActiveTextField;
01052 
01053             bActiveTextField = (INT8)GetActiveFieldID();
01054             if( bActiveTextField && bActiveTextField != -1 )
01055             {
01056                   Get16BitStringFromField( (UINT8)bActiveTextField, gzGameDescTextField );
01057             }
01058 
01059             //if there is save game in the slot, ask for confirmation before overwriting
01060             if( gbSaveGameArray[ bSaveGameID ] )
01061             {
01062                   CHAR16      sText[512];
01063 
01064                   swprintf( sText, zSaveLoadText[SLG_CONFIRM_SAVE], bSaveGameID );
01065 
01066                   DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, sText, SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmSavedGameMessageBoxCallBack );
01067             }
01068             else
01069             {
01070                   //else do NOT put up a confirmation
01071 
01072                   //Save the game
01073                   SaveGameToSlotNum();
01074             }
01075       }
01076       else 
01077       {
01078             //Check to see if the save game headers are the same
01079             ubRetVal = CompareSaveGameVersion( bSaveGameID );
01080             if( ubRetVal != SLS_HEADER_OK )
01081             {
01082                   if( ubRetVal == SLS_GAME_VERSION_OUT_OF_DATE )
01083                   {
01084                         DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_GAME_VERSION_DIF], SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, LoadSavedGameWarningMessageBoxCallBack );
01085                   }
01086                   else if( ubRetVal == SLS_SAVED_GAME_VERSION_OUT_OF_DATE )
01087                   {
01088                         DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_SAVED_GAME_VERSION_DIF], SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, LoadSavedGameWarningMessageBoxCallBack );
01089                   }
01090                   else 
01091                   {
01092                         DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_BOTH_GAME_AND_SAVED_GAME_DIF], SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, LoadSavedGameWarningMessageBoxCallBack );
01093                   }
01094             }
01095             else 
01096             {
01097 /*
01098                   IF YOU UNCOMMENT THIS -- LOCALIZE IT!!!
01099                   CHAR16      sText[512];
01100 
01101                   swprintf( sText, L"%s%d?", zSaveLoadText[SLG_CONFIRM_LOAD], bSaveGameID );
01102 
01103                   DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, sText, SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmLoadSavedGameMessageBoxCallBack );
01104 */
01105                   //Setup up the fade routines
01106                   StartFadeOutForSaveLoadScreen();
01107             }
01108       }
01109 }
01110 
01111 
01112 BOOLEAN DoSaveLoadMessageBoxWithRect( UINT8 ubStyle, INT16 *zString, UINT32 uiExitScreen, UINT16 usFlags, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback, SGPRect *pCenteringRect )
01113 {
01114       // do message box and return
01115   giSaveLoadMessageBox = DoMessageBox(  ubStyle,  zString,  uiExitScreen, ( UINT8 ) ( usFlags| MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT ),  ReturnCallback,  pCenteringRect );
01116 
01117       // send back return state
01118       return( ( giSaveLoadMessageBox != -1 ) );
01119 }
01120 
01121 template <typename string2>
01122 BOOLEAN     DoSaveLoadMessageBox( UINT8 ubStyle, string2 zString, UINT32 uiExitScreen, UINT16 usFlags, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback )
01123 {
01124   SGPRect CenteringRect= {0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH-1, SCREEN_HEIGHT-1 };
01125   
01126       // do message box and return
01127   giSaveLoadMessageBox = DoMessageBox(  ubStyle,  zString,  uiExitScreen, ( UINT8 ) ( usFlags| MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT ),  ReturnCallback,  &CenteringRect );
01128 
01129       // send back return state
01130       return( ( giSaveLoadMessageBox != -1 ) );
01131 }
01132 
01133 
01134 
01135 BOOLEAN InitSaveGameArray()
01136 {
01137       INT8  cnt;
01138       CHAR8       zSaveGameName[ 512 ];
01139       SAVED_GAME_HEADER SaveGameHeader;
01140       
01141 
01142       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; cnt++)
01143       {
01144             CreateSavedGameFileNameFromNumber( cnt, zSaveGameName );
01145 
01146             if( FileExists( zSaveGameName ) )
01147             {
01148                   //Get the header for the saved game
01149                   if( !LoadSavedGameHeader( cnt, &SaveGameHeader ) )
01150                         gbSaveGameArray[cnt] = FALSE;
01151                   else
01152                         gbSaveGameArray[cnt] = TRUE;
01153             }
01154             else
01155                   gbSaveGameArray[cnt] = FALSE;
01156       }
01157 
01158 
01159 
01160       return( TRUE );
01161 }
01162 
01163 
01164 BOOLEAN DisplaySaveGameList()
01165 {
01166       INT8  bLoop1;
01167 //    UINT16 usPosX = SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_X;
01168       UINT16 usPosY = SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_Y;
01169 
01170 
01171       for( bLoop1=0; bLoop1<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; bLoop1++)
01172       {
01173             //display all the information from the header
01174             DisplaySaveGameEntry( bLoop1 );//usPosY );
01175 
01176             usPosY += SLG_GAP_BETWEEN_LOCATIONS;
01177       }
01178 
01179       return( TRUE );
01180 }
01181 
01182 
01183 
01184 BOOLEAN DisplaySaveGameEntry( INT8 bEntryID )//, UINT16 usPosY )
01185 {
01186       CHAR16            zDateString[128];
01187       CHAR16            zLocationString[128];
01188       CHAR16            zNumMercsString[128];
01189       CHAR16            zBalanceString[128];
01190       SAVED_GAME_HEADER SaveGameHeader;
01191   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
01192       UINT16            usPosX=SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_X;
01193       UINT32            uiFont= SAVE_LOAD_TITLE_FONT;
01194       UINT8             ubFontColor=SAVE_LOAD_TITLE_COLOR;
01195       UINT16            usPosY = SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_Y + ( SLG_GAP_BETWEEN_LOCATIONS * bEntryID );
01196 
01197       //if we are going to be instantly leaving the screen, dont draw the numbers
01198       if( gfLoadGameUponEntry )
01199       {
01200             return( TRUE );
01201       }
01202 
01203       if( bEntryID == -1 )
01204             return( TRUE );
01205 
01206       //if we are currently fading out, leave
01207       if( gfStartedFadingOut )
01208             return( TRUE );
01209 
01210       //background
01211       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBackGroundAddOns);
01212       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ bEntryID ], usPosX, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01213 
01214 
01215       //
01216       //Set the shadow color
01217       //
01218 
01219       //if its the QuickSave slot
01220       if( bEntryID == 0 && gfSaveGame )
01221       {
01222             SetFontShadow( SAVE_LOAD_QUICKSAVE_SHADOW_COLOR );    
01223             ubFontColor = SAVE_LOAD_QUICKSAVE_COLOR;
01224             uiFont = SAVE_LOAD_QUICKSAVE_FONT;
01225 
01226             //Shadow the slot
01227 //          if( !gbSaveGameArray[ bEntryID ] )
01228             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX, usPosY, usPosX+SLG_SAVELOCATION_WIDTH, usPosY+SLG_SAVELOCATION_HEIGHT );
01229       }
01230 
01231       //else if its the currently selected location
01232       else if( bEntryID == gbSelectedSaveLocation )
01233       {
01234 
01235             SetFontShadow( SAVE_LOAD_SELECTED_SHADOW_COLOR );                 //130       
01236             ubFontColor = SAVE_LOAD_SELECTED_COLOR;//SAVE_LOAD_NORMAL_COLOR;
01237             uiFont = SAVE_LOAD_SELECTED_FONT;
01238       }
01239 
01240       //else it is the highlighted slot
01241       else if( bEntryID == gbHighLightedLocation )
01242       {
01243             SetFontShadow( SAVE_LOAD_HIGHLIGHTED_SHADOW_COLOR );  
01244             ubFontColor = SAVE_LOAD_HIGHLIGHTED_COLOR;
01245             uiFont = SAVE_LOAD_HIGHLIGHTED_FONT;
01246       }
01247 
01248       //if the file doesnt exists
01249       else if( !gbSaveGameArray[ bEntryID ] )
01250       {
01251             //if we are loading a game
01252             if( !gfSaveGame )
01253             {
01254                   SetFontShadow( SAVE_LOAD_QUICKSAVE_SHADOW_COLOR );
01255                   ubFontColor = SAVE_LOAD_QUICKSAVE_COLOR;
01256                   uiFont = SAVE_LOAD_QUICKSAVE_FONT;
01257 
01258                   //Shadow the surface
01259                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX, usPosY, usPosX+SLG_SAVELOCATION_WIDTH, usPosY+SLG_SAVELOCATION_HEIGHT );
01260             }
01261             else
01262             {
01263                   SetFontShadow( SAVE_LOAD_EMPTYSLOT_SHADOW_COLOR        );   
01264                   ubFontColor = SAVE_LOAD_EMPTYSLOT_COLOR;
01265                   uiFont = SAVE_LOAD_EMPTYSLOT_FONT;
01266             }
01267       }
01268       else
01269       {
01270             SetFontShadow( SAVE_LOAD_NORMAL_SHADOW_COLOR ); 
01271             ubFontColor = SAVE_LOAD_NORMAL_COLOR;
01272             uiFont = SAVE_LOAD_NORMAL_FONT;
01273       }
01274 
01275 
01276 
01277 
01278 
01279       //if the file exists
01280       if( gbSaveGameArray[ bEntryID ] || gbSelectedSaveLocation == bEntryID )
01281       {
01282             //
01283             // Setup the strings to be displayed
01284             //
01285 
01286             //if we are saving AND it is the currently selected slot
01287             if( gfSaveGame && gbSelectedSaveLocation == bEntryID )
01288             {
01289                   //the user has selected a spot to save.  Fill out all the required information
01290                   SaveGameHeader.uiDay = GetWorldDay();
01291                   SaveGameHeader.ubHour = (UINT8)GetWorldHour();
01292                   SaveGameHeader.ubMin = (UINT8)guiMin;
01293 
01294                   //Get the sector value to save.
01295                   GetBestPossibleSectorXYZValues( &SaveGameHeader.sSectorX, &SaveGameHeader.sSectorY, &SaveGameHeader.bSectorZ );
01296 
01297 //                SaveGameHeader.sSectorX = gWorldSectorX;
01298 //                SaveGameHeader.sSectorY = gWorldSectorY;
01299 //                SaveGameHeader.bSectorZ = gbWorldSectorZ;
01300                   SaveGameHeader.ubNumOfMercsOnPlayersTeam = NumberOfMercsOnPlayerTeam();
01301                   SaveGameHeader.iCurrentBalance = LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance;
01302                   wcscpy( SaveGameHeader.sSavedGameDesc, gzGameDescTextField );
01303 
01304                   //copy over the initial game options
01305                   memcpy( &SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions, &gGameOptions, sizeof( GAME_OPTIONS ) );
01306 
01307             }
01308             else
01309             {
01310                   //Get the header for the specified saved game
01311                   if( !LoadSavedGameHeader( bEntryID, &SaveGameHeader ) )
01312                   {
01313                         memset( &SaveGameHeader, 0, sizeof( SaveGameHeader ) );
01314                         return( FALSE );
01315                   }
01316             }
01317 
01318 
01319             //if this is the currently selected location, move the text down a bit
01320             if( gbSelectedSaveLocation == bEntryID )
01321             {
01322                   usPosX++;
01323                   usPosY--;
01324             }
01325 
01326             //if the user is LOADING and holding down the CTRL key, display the additional info
01327             if( !gfSaveGame && gfKeyState[ CTRL ] && gbSelectedSaveLocation == bEntryID )
01328             {
01329                   CHAR16            zMouseHelpTextString[256];
01330                   CHAR16            zDifString[256];
01331                   
01332                   //Create a string for difficulty level
01333                   swprintf( zDifString, L"%s %s", gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_EASY_TEXT + SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel - 1 ], zSaveLoadText[ SLG_DIFF ] );
01334                   
01335                   //make a string containing the extended options
01336                   swprintf( zMouseHelpTextString, L"%20s     %22s     %22s     %22s", zDifString,
01337                                     /*gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_TIMED_TURN_TITLE_TEXT + SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.fTurnTimeLimit + 1],*/
01338 //Madd
01339                                     //SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.fIronManMode ? gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_IRON_MAN_TEXT ] : gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_SAVE_ANYWHERE_TEXT ],
01340 
01341                                     SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.ubBobbyRay == BR_GOOD ? zSaveLoadText[ SLG_BR_GOOD_TEXT ] : (SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.ubBobbyRay == BR_GREAT ? zSaveLoadText[ SLG_BR_GREAT_TEXT ]: (SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.ubBobbyRay == BR_EXCELLENT ? zSaveLoadText[ SLG_BR_EXCELLENT_TEXT ]: zSaveLoadText[ SLG_BR_AWESOME_TEXT ])),
01342 
01343                                     SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.fGunNut ? zSaveLoadText[ SLG_ADDITIONAL_GUNS ] : zSaveLoadText[ SLG_NORMAL_GUNS ],
01344 
01345                                     SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_SCIFI ? zSaveLoadText[ SLG_SCIFI ] : (SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_PLATINUM ? zSaveLoadText[ SLG_PLATINUM ]: zSaveLoadText[ SLG_REALISTIC ]) );
01346 
01347 
01348                   //The date
01349                   DrawTextToScreen( zMouseHelpTextString, (UINT16)(usPosX+SLG_DATE_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_DATE_OFFSET_Y), 0, uiFont, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED    );
01350             }
01351             else
01352             {
01353                   //Create the string for the Data
01354                   swprintf( zDateString, L"%s %d, %02d:%02d", pMessageStrings[ MSG_DAY ], SaveGameHeader.uiDay, SaveGameHeader.ubHour, SaveGameHeader.ubMin );
01355 
01356                   //Create the string for the current location
01357                   if( SaveGameHeader.sSectorX == -1 && SaveGameHeader.sSectorY == -1 || SaveGameHeader.bSectorZ < 0 )
01358                   {
01359                         if( ( SaveGameHeader.uiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY + SaveGameHeader.ubHour * NUM_SEC_IN_HOUR + SaveGameHeader.ubMin * NUM_SEC_IN_MIN ) <= STARTING_TIME )
01360                               swprintf( zLocationString, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
01361                         else
01362                               swprintf( zLocationString, gzLateLocalizedString[14] );
01363                   }
01364                   else
01365                   {
01366                         gfGettingNameFromSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;
01367 
01368                         GetSectorIDString( SaveGameHeader.sSectorX, SaveGameHeader.sSectorY, SaveGameHeader.bSectorZ, zLocationString, FALSE );
01369 
01370                         gfGettingNameFromSaveLoadScreen = FALSE;
01371                   }
01372 
01373                   //
01374                   // Number of mercs on the team
01375                   //
01376 
01377                   //if only 1 merc is on the team
01378                   if( SaveGameHeader.ubNumOfMercsOnPlayersTeam == 1 )
01379                   {
01380                         //use "merc"
01381                         swprintf( zNumMercsString, L"%d %s", SaveGameHeader.ubNumOfMercsOnPlayersTeam, MercAccountText[ MERC_ACCOUNT_MERC ] );
01382                   }
01383                   else
01384                   {
01385                         //use "mercs"
01386                         swprintf( zNumMercsString, L"%d %s", SaveGameHeader.ubNumOfMercsOnPlayersTeam, pMessageStrings[ MSG_MERCS ] );
01387                   }
01388 
01389                   //Get the current balance
01390                   swprintf( zBalanceString, L"%d", SaveGameHeader.iCurrentBalance);
01391                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zBalanceString );
01392                   InsertDollarSignInToString( zBalanceString );
01393 
01394                   //
01395                   // Display the Saved game information
01396                   // 
01397 
01398                   //The date
01399                   DrawTextToScreen( zDateString, (UINT16)(usPosX+SLG_DATE_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_DATE_OFFSET_Y), 0, uiFont, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01400 
01401                   //if the sector string exceeds the width, and the ...
01402                   ReduceStringLength( zLocationString, SLG_SECTOR_WIDTH, uiFont );
01403 
01404                   //The Sector
01405                   DrawTextToScreen( zLocationString, (UINT16)(usPosX+SLG_SECTOR_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_SECTOR_OFFSET_Y), 0, uiFont, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED     );
01406 
01407                   //The Num of mercs
01408                   DrawTextToScreen( zNumMercsString, (UINT16)(usPosX+SLG_NUM_MERCS_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_NUM_MERCS_OFFSET_Y), 0, uiFont, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED     );
01409 
01410                   //The balance
01411                   DrawTextToScreen( zBalanceString, (UINT16)(usPosX+SLG_BALANCE_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_BALANCE_OFFSET_Y), 0, uiFont, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED    );
01412 
01413                   if( gbSaveGameArray[ bEntryID ] || ( gfSaveGame && !gfUserInTextInputMode && ( gbSelectedSaveLocation == bEntryID ) ) )
01414                   {
01415                         //The Saved Game description
01416                         DrawTextToScreen( SaveGameHeader.sSavedGameDesc, (UINT16)(usPosX+SLG_SAVE_GAME_DESC_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_SAVE_GAME_DESC_Y), 0, uiFont, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01417                   }
01418             }
01419       }
01420       else
01421       {
01422             //if this is the quick save slot
01423             if( bEntryID == 0 )
01424             {
01425                   //display the empty spot
01426                   DrawTextToScreen( pMessageStrings[ MSG_EMPTY_QUICK_SAVE_SLOT ], usPosX, (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_DATE_OFFSET_Y), 609, uiFont, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED    );
01427             }
01428             else
01429             {
01430                   //display the empty spot
01431                   DrawTextToScreen( pMessageStrings[ MSG_EMPTYSLOT ], usPosX, (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_DATE_OFFSET_Y), 609, uiFont, ubFontColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED    );
01432             }
01433       }
01434 
01435       //REset the shadow color
01436       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
01437 
01438 
01439       usPosX=SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_X;
01440       usPosY = SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_Y + ( SLG_GAP_BETWEEN_LOCATIONS * bEntryID );
01441 
01442       InvalidateRegion( usPosX, usPosY, usPosX+SLG_SAVELOCATION_WIDTH, usPosY+SLG_SAVELOCATION_HEIGHT );
01443 
01444       return( TRUE );
01445 }
01446 
01447 
01448 
01449 BOOLEAN LoadSavedGameHeader( INT8 bEntry, SAVED_GAME_HEADER *pSaveGameHeader )
01450 {
01451       HWFILE hFile;
01452       CHAR8       zSavedGameName[512];
01453       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
01454 
01455       //make sure the entry is valid
01456       if( bEntry < 0 || bEntry > NUM_SAVE_GAMES )
01457       {
01458             memset( &pSaveGameHeader, 0, sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ) );
01459             return( FALSE );
01460       }
01461 
01462       //Get the name of the file
01463       CreateSavedGameFileNameFromNumber( bEntry, zSavedGameName );
01464 
01465       if( FileExists( zSavedGameName ) )
01466       {
01467             // create the save game file
01468             hFile = FileOpen( zSavedGameName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
01469             if( !hFile )
01470             {
01471                   FileClose( hFile );
01472                   gbSaveGameArray[ bEntry ] = FALSE;
01473                   return(FALSE);
01474             }
01475 
01476             //Load the Save Game header file
01477             FileRead( hFile, pSaveGameHeader, sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01478             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ) )
01479             {
01480                   FileClose( hFile );
01481                   gbSaveGameArray[ bEntry ] = FALSE;
01482                   return(FALSE);
01483             }
01484 
01485             FileClose( hFile );
01486 
01487             //
01488             // Do some Tests on the header to make sure it is valid
01489             //
01490 
01491             //Check to see if the desc field is bigger then it should be, ie no null char
01492             if( wcslen( pSaveGameHeader->sSavedGameDesc ) >= SIZE_OF_SAVE_GAME_DESC )
01493             {
01494                   memset( pSaveGameHeader, 0, sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ) );
01495                   gbSaveGameArray[ bEntry ] = FALSE;
01496                   return(FALSE);
01497             }
01498 
01499             //Check to see if the version # field is bigger then it should be, ie no null char
01500             if( strlen( pSaveGameHeader->zGameVersionNumber ) >= GAME_VERSION_LENGTH )
01501             {
01502                   memset( pSaveGameHeader, 0, sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ) );
01503                   gbSaveGameArray[ bEntry ] = FALSE;
01504                   return(FALSE);
01505             }
01506       }
01507       else
01508       {
01509             memset( &pSaveGameHeader, 0, sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ) );
01510 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01511             wcscpy( pSaveGameHeader->sSavedGameDesc, L"ERROR loading saved game header, file doesn't exist!!" );
01512 #endif
01513       }
01514 
01515       return( TRUE );
01516 }
01517 
01518 
01519 void BtnSlgCancelCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01520 {
01521       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01522       {
01523             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01524             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01525       }
01526       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01527       {
01528             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01529 
01530             //Exit back
01531             if( gfCameDirectlyFromGame )
01532                   SetSaveLoadExitScreen( guiPreviousOptionScreen );
01533 
01534             else if( guiPreviousOptionScreen == MAINMENU_SCREEN )
01535                   SetSaveLoadExitScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
01536 
01537             else
01538                   SetSaveLoadExitScreen( OPTIONS_SCREEN );
01539 
01540 
01541             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01542       }
01543       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01544       {
01545             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01546             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01547       }
01548 }

01560       {

01562

01564 
01565 
01566

01601 
01602 void SelectedSaveRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01603 { 
01604       INT8        bActiveTextField;
01605 
01606       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01607       {
01608       }
01609       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01610       {
01611             UINT8 bSelected = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01612             static UINT32     uiLastTime = 0;
01613             UINT32      uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
01614             INT32 i;
01615 
01616 /*
01617             //If we are saving and this is the quick save slot
01618             if( gfSaveGame && bSelected == 0 )
01619             {
01620                   //Display a pop up telling user what the quick save slot is
01621                   DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_QUICK_SAVE_RESERVED_FOR_TACTICAL ], SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, RedrawSaveLoadScreenAfterMessageBox );
01622                   return;
01623             }
01624 
01625             SetSelection( bSelected );
01626 */
01627 
01628             //If we are saving and this is the quick save slot
01629             if( gfSaveGame && bSelected == 0 )
01630             {
01631                   //Display a pop up telling user what the quick save slot is
01632                   DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_QUICK_SAVE_RESERVED_FOR_TACTICAL ], SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, RedrawSaveLoadScreenAfterMessageBox );
01633                   return;
01634             }
01635 
01636             //Reset the regions
01637             for( i=0; i<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; i++)
01638                   gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[i] = SLG_UNSELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
01639 
01640             //if the user is selecting an unselected saved game slot
01641             if( gbSelectedSaveLocation != bSelected )
01642             {
01643                   //Destroy the previous region
01644                   DestroySaveLoadTextInputBoxes();
01645       
01646                   gbSelectedSaveLocation = bSelected;
01647 
01648                   //Reset the global string
01649                   gzGameDescTextField[0] = '\0';
01650 
01651                   //Init the text field for the game desc
01652                   InitSaveLoadScreenTextInputBoxes();
01653 
01654                   //If we are Loading the game
01655 //                if( !gfSaveGame )
01656                   {
01657                         //Enable the save/load button
01658                         EnableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
01659                   }
01660 
01661                   //If we are saving the game, disbale the button
01662 //                if( gfSaveGame )
01663 //                            DisableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
01664 //                else
01665                   {
01666                         //Set the time in which the button was first pressed
01667                         uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
01668                   }
01669 
01670                   //Set the selected region to be highlighted
01671                   gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ bSelected ] = SLG_SELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
01672 
01673                   gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;
01674 
01675                   uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
01676             }
01677             
01678             //the user is selecting the selected save game slot
01679             else
01680             {
01681                   //if we are saving a game
01682                   if( gfSaveGame )
01683                   {
01684                         //if the user is not currently editing the game desc
01685                         if( !gfUserInTextInputMode )
01686                         {
01687 //                            SaveLoadGameNumber( gbSelectedSaveLocation );
01688 
01689                               if( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) < SLG_DOUBLE_CLICK_DELAY )
01690                               {
01691                                     //Load the saved game
01692                                     SaveLoadGameNumber( gbSelectedSaveLocation );
01693                               }
01694                               else
01695                               {
01696                                     uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
01697                               }
01698 
01699                               InitSaveLoadScreenTextInputBoxes();
01700 
01701                               //Set the selected region to be highlighted
01702                               gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ bSelected ] = SLG_SELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
01703 
01704                               gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;
01705 
01706                         }
01707                         else
01708                         {
01709                               bActiveTextField = (INT8)GetActiveFieldID();
01710                               if( bActiveTextField && bActiveTextField != -1 )
01711                               {
01712                                     Get16BitStringFromField( (UINT8)bActiveTextField, gzGameDescTextField);
01713                                     SetActiveField(0);
01714 
01715                                     DestroySaveLoadTextInputBoxes();
01716 
01717 //                                  gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;
01718 
01719 //                                  EnableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
01720 
01721                                     DisplaySaveGameEntry( gbLastHighLightedLocation );
01722 
01723                                     gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;
01724 
01725 
01726                                     if( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) < SLG_DOUBLE_CLICK_DELAY )
01727                                     {
01728                                           gubSaveGameNextPass = 1;
01729                                     }
01730                                     else
01731                                     {
01732                                           uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
01733                                     }
01734                               }
01735                         }
01736                         //Set the selected region to be highlighted
01737                         gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ bSelected ] = SLG_SELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
01738                   }
01739                   //else we are loading
01740                   else
01741                   {
01742                         if( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) < SLG_DOUBLE_CLICK_DELAY )
01743                         {
01744                               //Load the saved game
01745                               SaveLoadGameNumber( bSelected );
01746                         }
01747                         else
01748                         {
01749                               uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
01750                         }
01751                   }
01752             }
01753             //Set the selected region to be highlighted
01754             gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ bSelected ] = SLG_SELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
01755 
01756 
01757       } 
01758       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
01759       {
01760             DisableSelectedSlot();
01761       } 
01762 }
01763 
01764 
01765 void SelectedSaveRegionMovementCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 reason )
01766 {
01767       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01768       {
01769             INT8  bTemp;
01770             pRegion->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01771 
01772 
01773             bTemp = gbHighLightedLocation;
01774             gbHighLightedLocation = -1;
01775 //          DisplaySaveGameList();
01776             DisplaySaveGameEntry( bTemp );
01777 
01778             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01779       }
01780       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
01781       {
01782             pRegion->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ;
01783 
01784             //If we are saving and this is the quick save slot, leave
01785             if( gfSaveGame && MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 ) != 0 )
01786             {
01787                   return;
01788             }
01789 
01790             gbLastHighLightedLocation = gbHighLightedLocation;
01791             gbHighLightedLocation = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01792 
01793             DisplaySaveGameEntry( gbLastHighLightedLocation );
01794             DisplaySaveGameEntry( gbHighLightedLocation );//, usPosY );
01795 
01796             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01797       }
01798 }

01802 
01803 
01804 void InitSaveLoadScreenTextInputBoxes()
01805 {
01806       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
01807       UINT16      usPosY;
01808       SAVED_GAME_HEADER SaveGameHeader;
01809       
01810       if( gbSelectedSaveLocation == -1 )
01811             return;
01812 
01813       if( !gfSaveGame )
01814             return;
01815 
01816       //if we are exiting, dont create the fields
01817       if( gfSaveLoadScreenExit || guiSaveLoadExitScreen != SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN )
01818             return;
01819 
01820 
01821       InitTextInputMode();
01822 
01823       SetTextInputCursor( CUROSR_IBEAM_WHITE );
01824       SetTextInputFont( (UINT16) FONT12ARIALFIXEDWIDTH ); //FONT12ARIAL //FONT12ARIALFIXEDWIDTH
01825       Set16BPPTextFieldColor( Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0) ) );
01826       SetBevelColors( Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(136, 138, 135)), Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(24, 61, 81)) );
01827       SetTextInputRegularColors( FONT_WHITE, 2 ); 
01828       SetTextInputHilitedColors( 2, FONT_WHITE, FONT_WHITE  );
01829       SetCursorColor( Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(255, 255, 255) ) );
01830       
01831       AddUserInputField( NULL );
01832 
01833       usPosY = SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_Y + SLG_GAP_BETWEEN_LOCATIONS * gbSelectedSaveLocation;
01834 
01835       //if there is already a string here, use its string
01836       if( gbSaveGameArray[ gbSelectedSaveLocation ] )
01837       {
01838             //if we are modifying a previously modifed string, use it
01839             if( gzGameDescTextField[0] != '\0' )
01840             {
01841             }
01842             else
01843             {
01844                   //Get the header for the specified saved game
01845                   LoadSavedGameHeader( gbSelectedSaveLocation, &SaveGameHeader );
01846                   wcscpy( gzGameDescTextField, SaveGameHeader.sSavedGameDesc );
01847             }
01848       }
01849       else
01850             gzGameDescTextField[0] = '\0';
01851 
01852       //Game Desc Field
01853       AddTextInputField( SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_X+SLG_SAVE_GAME_DESC_X, (INT16)(usPosY+SLG_SAVE_GAME_DESC_Y-5), SLG_SAVELOCATION_WIDTH-SLG_SAVE_GAME_DESC_X-7, 17, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+2, gzGameDescTextField, 46, INPUTTYPE_ASCII );//23
01854 
01855       SetActiveField( 1 );
01856 
01857       gfUserInTextInputMode = TRUE;
01858 }
01859 
01860 void DestroySaveLoadTextInputBoxes()
01861 {
01862       gfUserInTextInputMode = FALSE;
01863       KillAllTextInputModes();
01864       SetTextInputCursor( CURSOR_IBEAM );
01865 }

01868 void SetSelection( UINT8 ubNewSelection )
01869 {
01870 //    CHAR16            zMouseHelpTextString[256];
01871 //    SAVED_GAME_HEADER SaveGameHeader;
01872 
01873       //if we are loading and there is no entry, return 
01874       if( !gfSaveGame )
01875       {
01876             if( !gbSaveGameArray[ubNewSelection] )
01877                   return;
01878       }
01879 
01880       //Reset the selected slot background graphic
01881       if( gbSelectedSaveLocation != -1 )
01882       {
01883             gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ gbSelectedSaveLocation ] = SLG_UNSELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
01884 
01885             //reset the slots help text
01886             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gSelectedSaveRegion[ gbSelectedSaveLocation ], L"\0" );
01887       }
01888

01893       if( !gfSaveGame )
01894       {
01895             //Enable the save/load button
01896             EnableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
01897       }
01898 
01899       //if we are to save
01900       if( gfSaveGame )
01901       {
01902             if( gbSelectedSaveLocation != ubNewSelection )
01903             {
01904                   //Destroy the previous region
01905                   DestroySaveLoadTextInputBoxes();
01906       
01907                   //reset selected slot
01908                   gbSelectedSaveLocation = ubNewSelection;
01909 
01910                   //Null out the currently selected save game
01911                   gzGameDescTextField[0] = '\0';
01912 
01913                   //Init the text field for the game desc
01914                   InitSaveLoadScreenTextInputBoxes();
01915             }
01916 
01917             //Enable the save/load button
01918             EnableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
01919       }
01920 
01921       //reset selected slot
01922       gbSelectedSaveLocation = ubNewSelection;
01923 
01924       //Set the selected slot background graphic
01925       gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[ gbSelectedSaveLocation ] = SLG_SELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
01926 
01927 /*
01928       //if we are saving AND it is the currently selected slot
01929       if( gfSaveGame && gbSelectedSaveLocation == ubNewSelection )
01930       {
01931             //copy over the initial game options
01932             memcpy( &SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions, &gGameOptions, sizeof( GAME_OPTIONS ) );
01933       }
01934       else
01935       {
01936             //Get the header for the specified saved game
01937             if( !LoadSavedGameHeader( ubNewSelection, &SaveGameHeader ) )
01938             {
01939                   memset( &SaveGameHeader, 0, sizeof( SaveGameHeader ) );
01940             }
01941       }
01942

01944             gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_DIF_LEVEL_TEXT + SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel + 1 ],
01945 
01946             gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_TIMED_TURN_TITLE_TEXT ],

01948 
01949             gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_GUN_OPTIONS_TEXT ],
01950             gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_GUN_OPTIONS_TEXT + 2 - SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.fGunNut ],
01951 
01952             gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_GAME_STYLE_TEXT ],
01953             gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_GAME_STYLE_TEXT + (SaveGameHeader.sInitialGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_SCIFI)?1:0; + 1 ] );
01954 
01955       //set the slots help text
01956       SetRegionFastHelpText( &gSelectedSaveRegion[ gbSelectedSaveLocation ], zMouseHelpTextString );
01957       */
01958 }
01959 
01960 
01961 UINT8 CompareSaveGameVersion( INT8 bSaveGameID )
01962 {
01963       UINT8 ubRetVal=SLS_HEADER_OK;
01964 
01965       SAVED_GAME_HEADER SaveGameHeader;
01966 
01967       //Get the heade for the saved game
01968       LoadSavedGameHeader( bSaveGameID, &SaveGameHeader );
01969 
01970       // check to see if the saved game version in the header is the same as the current version
01971       if( SaveGameHeader.uiSavedGameVersion != guiSavedGameVersion )
01972       {
01973             ubRetVal = SLS_SAVED_GAME_VERSION_OUT_OF_DATE;
01974       }
01975 
01976       if( strcmp( SaveGameHeader.zGameVersionNumber, czVersionNumber ) != 0 )
01977       {
01978             if( ubRetVal == SLS_SAVED_GAME_VERSION_OUT_OF_DATE )
01979                   ubRetVal = SLS_BOTH_SAVE_GAME_AND_GAME_VERSION_OUT_OF_DATE;
01980             else
01981                   ubRetVal = SLS_GAME_VERSION_OUT_OF_DATE;
01982       }
01983 
01984       return( ubRetVal );
01985 }
01986 
01987 
01988 void LoadSavedGameWarningMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
01989 {
01990       // yes, load the game
01991   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
01992       {
01993             //Setup up the fade routines
01994             StartFadeOutForSaveLoadScreen();
01995       }
01996 
01997       //The user does NOT want to continue..
01998       else
01999       {
02000             //ask if the user wants to delete all the saved game files
02001             DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_DELETE_ALL_SAVE_GAMES], SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, LoadSavedGameDeleteAllSaveGameMessageBoxCallBack );
02002       }
02003 }
02004 
02005 
02006 void LoadSavedGameDeleteAllSaveGameMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
02007 {
02008       // yes, Delete all the save game files
02009   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
02010       {
02011             DeleteAllSaveGameFile( );
02012             gfSaveLoadScreenExit = TRUE;
02013       }
02014 
02015       gfExitAfterMessageBox = TRUE;
02016 
02017       SetSaveLoadExitScreen( OPTIONS_SCREEN );
02018 
02019       gbSelectedSaveLocation=-1;
02020 }
02021 
02022 void DeleteAllSaveGameFile( )
02023 {
02024       UINT8 cnt;
02025 
02026       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; cnt++)
02027       {
02028             DeleteSaveGameNumber( cnt );
02029       }
02030 
02031       gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot = -1;
02032 
02033       InitSaveGameArray();
02034 }
02035 
02036 void DeleteSaveGameNumber( UINT8 ubSaveGameSlotID )
02037 {
02038       CHAR8       zSaveGameName[ 512 ];
02039 
02040       //Create the name of the file
02041       CreateSavedGameFileNameFromNumber( ubSaveGameSlotID, zSaveGameName );
02042 
02043       //Delete the saved game file
02044       FileDelete( zSaveGameName );
02045 }
02046 
02047 void DisplayOnScreenNumber( BOOLEAN fErase )
02048 {
02049       wchar_t           zTempString[16];
02050       UINT16            usPosX = 6;
02051       UINT16            usPosY;
02052       INT8              bLoopNum;
02053       INT8              bNum=0;
02054 
02055       usPosY = SLG_FIRST_SAVED_SPOT_Y;
02056 
02057       for( bLoopNum=0; bLoopNum<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; bLoopNum++)
02058       {
02059             //Dont diplay it for the quicksave
02060             if( bLoopNum == 0 )
02061             {
02062                   usPosY += SLG_GAP_BETWEEN_LOCATIONS;
02063                   continue;
02064             }
02065 
02066             BlitBufferToBuffer(guiSAVEBUFFER, guiRENDERBUFFER, usPosX, (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_DATE_OFFSET_Y), 10, 10 );
02067 
02068             if( bLoopNum != 10 )
02069             {
02070                   bNum = bLoopNum;
02071                   swprintf( zTempString, L"%2d", bNum );
02072             }
02073             else
02074             {
02075                   bNum = 0;
02076                   swprintf( zTempString, L"%2d", bNum );
02077             }
02078 
02079             if( !fErase )
02080                   DrawTextToScreen( zTempString, usPosX, (UINT16)(usPosY+SLG_DATE_OFFSET_Y), 0, SAVE_LOAD_NUMBER_FONT, SAVE_LOAD_NUMBER_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED   );
02081 
02082             InvalidateRegion( usPosX, usPosY+SLG_DATE_OFFSET_Y, usPosX+10, usPosY+SLG_DATE_OFFSET_Y+10 );   
02083 
02084             usPosY += SLG_GAP_BETWEEN_LOCATIONS;
02085       }
02086 }
02087 
02088 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02089       extern BOOLEAN ValidateSoldierInitLinks( UINT8 ubCode );
02090 #endif
02091 
02092 void DoneFadeOutForSaveLoadScreen( void )
02093 {
02094       //Make sure we DONT reset the levels if we are loading a game
02095       gfHadToMakeBasementLevels = FALSE;
02096 
02097       if( !LoadSavedGame( gbSelectedSaveLocation ) )
02098       {
02099             if( guiBrokenSaveGameVersion < 95 && !gfSchedulesHosed )
02100             { //Hack problem with schedules getting misaligned.
02101                   gfSchedulesHosed = TRUE;
02102                   if( !LoadSavedGame( gbSelectedSaveLocation ) )
02103                   {
02104                         DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_LOAD_GAME_ERROR], SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, FailedLoadingGameCallBack );
02105                         NextLoopCheckForEnoughFreeHardDriveSpace();
02106                   }
02107                   else
02108                   {
02109                         gfSchedulesHosed = FALSE;
02110                         goto SUCCESSFULLY_CORRECTED_SAVE;
02111                   }
02112                   gfSchedulesHosed = FALSE;
02113             }
02114             else
02115             {
02116                   DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_LOAD_GAME_ERROR], SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, FailedLoadingGameCallBack );
02117                   NextLoopCheckForEnoughFreeHardDriveSpace();
02118             }
02119       }
02120       else
02121       {
02122             SUCCESSFULLY_CORRECTED_SAVE:
02123             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02124 //          if( ValidateSoldierInitLinks( 1 ) )
02125             ValidateSoldierInitLinks( 1 );
02126             {
02127             #endif
02128                   //If we are to go to map screen after loading the game
02129                   if( guiScreenToGotoAfterLoadingSavedGame == MAP_SCREEN )
02130                   {
02131                         gFadeInDoneCallback = DoneFadeInForSaveLoadScreen;
02132 
02133                         SetSaveLoadExitScreen( guiScreenToGotoAfterLoadingSavedGame );
02134 
02135       //                LeaveTacticalScreen( MAP_SCREEN );
02136 
02137                         FadeInNextFrame( );
02138                   }
02139 
02140                   else
02141                   {
02142                         //if we are to go to the Tactical screen after loading
02143                         gFadeInDoneCallback = DoneFadeInForSaveLoadScreen;
02144             
02145                         SetSaveLoadExitScreen( guiScreenToGotoAfterLoadingSavedGame );
02146 
02147                         PauseTime( FALSE );
02148 
02149       //                EnterTacticalScreen( );
02150                         FadeInGameScreen( );
02151                   }
02152             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02153             }
02154             #endif
02155       }
02156       gfStartedFadingOut = FALSE;
02157 }
02158 
02159 void DoneFadeInForSaveLoadScreen( void )
02160 {
02161       //Leave the screen
02162       //if we are supposed to stay in tactical, due nothing, 
02163       //if we are supposed to goto mapscreen, leave tactical and go to mapscreen
02164 
02165       if( guiScreenToGotoAfterLoadingSavedGame == MAP_SCREEN )
02166       {
02167             if( !gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause )
02168             {
02169                   UnLockPauseState( );
02170                   UnPauseGame( );
02171             }
02172       }
02173 
02174       else
02175       {
02176             //if the game is currently paused
02177             if( GamePaused() )
02178             {
02179                   //need to call it twice
02180                   HandlePlayerPauseUnPauseOfGame();
02181                   HandlePlayerPauseUnPauseOfGame();
02182             }
02183 
02184 //          UnLockPauseState( );
02185 //          UnPauseGame( );
02186 
02187       }
02188 }

02194       {
02195       }
02196       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02197       {
02198             DisableSelectedSlot();
02199       } 
02200 }

02203 {
02204       //reset selected slot
02205       gbSelectedSaveLocation = -1;
02206       gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;
02207       DestroySaveLoadTextInputBoxes();
02208 
02209       if( !gfSaveGame )
02210             DisableButton( guiSlgSaveLoadBtn );
02211 
02212       //reset the selected graphic
02213       ClearSelectedSaveSlot();
02214 }

02232

02245 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02246 void ErrorDetectedInSaveCallback( UINT8 bValue )
02247 {
02248       //If we are to go to map screen after loading the game
02249       if( guiScreenToGotoAfterLoadingSavedGame == MAP_SCREEN )
02250       {
02251             gFadeInDoneCallback = DoneFadeInForSaveLoadScreen;
02252             SetSaveLoadExitScreen( guiScreenToGotoAfterLoadingSavedGame );
02253             FadeInNextFrame( );
02254       }
02255       else
02256       {
02257             //if we are to go to the Tactical screen after loading
02258             gFadeInDoneCallback = DoneFadeInForSaveLoadScreen;
02259             SetSaveLoadExitScreen( guiScreenToGotoAfterLoadingSavedGame );
02260             FadeInGameScreen( );
02261       }
02262       gfStartedFadingOut = TRUE;

02264 #endif
02265 
02266 void              FailedLoadingGameCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
02267 {
02268       // yes
02269   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK )
02270       {
02271             //if the current screen is tactical
02272             if( guiPreviousOptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02273             {
02274                   SetPendingNewScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
02275             }
02276             else
02277             {
02278                   LeaveTacticalScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
02279             }
02280 
02281             SetSaveLoadExitScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
02282 
02283 
02284             //We want to reinitialize the game
02285             ReStartingGame();
02286       }
02287 }
