02290 BOOLEAN DoQuickSave()
02291 {
02292       gzGameDescTextField[0] = '\0';
02293 
02294 /*
02295       // Make sure the user has enough hard drive space
02296       if( !DoesUserHaveEnoughHardDriveSpace() )
02297       {
02298             CHAR16      zText[512];
02299             CHAR16      zSpaceOnDrive[512];
02300             UINT32      uiSpaceOnDrive;
02301             CHAR16      zSizeNeeded[512];
02302 
02303             swprintf( zSizeNeeded, L"%d", REQUIRED_FREE_SPACE / BYTESINMEGABYTE );
02304             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zSizeNeeded );
02305 
02306             uiSpaceOnDrive = GetFreeSpaceOnHardDriveWhereGameIsRunningFrom( );
02307 
02308             swprintf( zSpaceOnDrive, L"%.2f", uiSpaceOnDrive / (FLOAT)BYTESINMEGABYTE );
02309 
02310             swprintf( zText, pMessageStrings[ MSG_LOWDISKSPACE_WARNING ], zSpaceOnDrive, zSizeNeeded );
02311 
02312             if( guiPreviousOptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02313                   DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zText, MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NotEnoughHardDriveSpaceForQuickSaveMessageBoxCallBack );
02314             else
02315                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zText, GAME_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NotEnoughHardDriveSpaceForQuickSaveMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
02316 
02317             return( FALSE );
02318       }
02319 */
02320 
02321       if( !SaveGame( 0, gzGameDescTextField ) )
02322       {
02323             //Unset the fact that we are saving a game
02324             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~LOADING_SAVED_GAME;
02325 
02326             if( guiPreviousOptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02327                   DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)zSaveLoadText[SLG_SAVE_GAME_ERROR], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
02328             else
02329                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_SAVE_GAME_ERROR], GAME_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
02330       }
02331 
02332       return( TRUE );
02333 }
02334 
02335 BOOLEAN DoQuickLoad()
02336 {
02337       //Build the save game array
02338       InitSaveGameArray();
02339 
02340       //if there is no save in the quick save slot
02341       if( !gbSaveGameArray[ 0 ] )
02342             return( FALSE );
02343 
02344       //Set the selection to be the quick save slot
02345       gbSelectedSaveLocation = 0;
02346 
02347       //if the game is paused, and we are in tactical, unpause
02348       if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
02349       {
02350             PauseTime( FALSE );
02351       }
02352 
02353       //Do a fade out before we load the game
02354       gFadeOutDoneCallback = DoneFadeOutForSaveLoadScreen;
02355 
02356       FadeOutNextFrame( );
02357       gfStartedFadingOut = TRUE;
02358       gfDoingQuickLoad = TRUE;
02359 
02360       return( TRUE );
02361 }
02362 
02363 
02364 BOOLEAN IsThereAnySavedGameFiles()
02365 {
02366       INT8  cnt;
02367       CHAR8       zSaveGameName[ 512 ];
02368       
02369       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; cnt++)
02370       {
02371             CreateSavedGameFileNameFromNumber( cnt, zSaveGameName );
02372 
02373             if( FileExists( zSaveGameName ) )
02374                   return( TRUE );
02375       }
02376 
02377       return( FALSE );
02378 }
02379 
02380 void  NotEnoughHardDriveSpaceForQuickSaveMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
02381 {
02382       if( !SaveGame( 0, gzGameDescTextField ) )
02383       {
02384             //Unset the fact that we are saving a game
02385             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~LOADING_SAVED_GAME;
02386 
02387             //Set a flag indicating that the save failed ( cant initiate a message box from within a mb callback )
02388             gfFailedToSaveGameWhenInsideAMessageBox = TRUE;
02389       }
02390 }
02391 
02392 void  NotEnoughHardDriveSpaceForNormalSaveMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
02393 {
02394       if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK )
02395       {
02396             //If the game failed to save
02397             if( !SaveGame( gbSelectedSaveLocation, gzGameDescTextField ) )
02398             {
02399                   //Unset the fact that we are saving a game
02400                   gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~LOADING_SAVED_GAME;
02401 
02402                   //Set a flag indicating that the save failed ( cant initiate a message box from within a mb callback )
02403                   gfFailedToSaveGameWhenInsideAMessageBox = TRUE;
02404             }
02405             else
02406             {
02407                   SetSaveLoadExitScreen( guiPreviousOptionScreen );
02408             }
02409       }
02410 }

02412 
02413 void RedrawSaveLoadScreenAfterMessageBox( UINT8 bExitValue )
02414 {
02415       gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;
02416 }
02417 
02418 
02419 void MoveSelectionUpOrDown( BOOLEAN fUp )
02420 {
02421       INT32 i;
02422 
02423       //if we are saving, any slot otgher then the quick save slot is valid
02424       if( gfSaveGame )
02425       {
02426             if( fUp )
02427             {
02428                   //if there is no selected slot, get out
02429                   if( gbSelectedSaveLocation == -1 )
02430                         return;
02431 
02432                   //if the selected slot is above the first slot
02433                   if( gbSelectedSaveLocation > 1 )
02434                   {
02435                         SetSelection( (UINT8)(gbSelectedSaveLocation-1) );
02436                   }
02437             }
02438             else
02439             {
02440                   //if the selected slot is invalid
02441                   if( gbSelectedSaveLocation == -1 )
02442                   {
02443                         SetSelection( 1 );
02444                   }
02445                   else
02446                   {
02447                         if( gbSelectedSaveLocation >= 1 && gbSelectedSaveLocation < NUM_SAVE_GAMES-1 )
02448                         {
02449                               SetSelection( (UINT8)(gbSelectedSaveLocation + 1) );
02450                         }
02451                   }
02452             }
02453       }
02454 
02455       else
02456       {
02457             if( fUp )
02458             {
02459                   for( i=gbSelectedSaveLocation-1; i>=0; i--)
02460                   {
02461                         if( gbSaveGameArray[i] )
02462                         {
02463                               ClearSelectedSaveSlot();
02464 
02465                               SetSelection( (UINT8)i );
02466                               break;
02467                         }     
02468                   }
02469             }
02470             else
02471             {
02472                   //if there is no selected slot, move the selected slot to the first slot
02473                   if( gbSelectedSaveLocation == -1 )
02474                   {
02475                         ClearSelectedSaveSlot();
02476 
02477                         SetSelection( 0 );
02478                   }
02479                   else
02480                   {
02481                         for( i=gbSelectedSaveLocation+1; i<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; i++)
02482                         {
02483                               if( gbSaveGameArray[i] )
02484                               {
02485                                     ClearSelectedSaveSlot();
02486 
02487                                     SetSelection( (UINT8)i );
02488                                     break;
02489                               }     
02490                         }
02491                   }
02492             }
02493       }
02494 }
02495 
02496 
02497 
02498 void ClearSelectedSaveSlot()
02499 {
02500       INT32 i;
02501       for( i=0; i<NUM_SAVE_GAMES; i++)
02502             gbSaveGameSelectedLocation[i] = SLG_UNSELECTED_SLOT_GRAPHICS_NUMBER;
02503 
02504       gbSelectedSaveLocation = -1;
02505 }
02506 
02507 
02508 void SaveGameToSlotNum()
02509 {
02510 /*
02511       // Make sure the user has enough hard drive space
02512       if( !DoesUserHaveEnoughHardDriveSpace() )
02513       {
02514             CHAR16      zText[512];
02515             CHAR16      zSizeNeeded[512];
02516             CHAR16      zSpaceOnDrive[512];
02517             UINT32      uiSpaceOnDrive;
02518 
02519             swprintf( zSizeNeeded, L"%d", REQUIRED_FREE_SPACE / BYTESINMEGABYTE );
02520             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zSizeNeeded );
02521 
02522             uiSpaceOnDrive = GetFreeSpaceOnHardDriveWhereGameIsRunningFrom( );
02523 
02524             swprintf( zSpaceOnDrive, L"%.2f", uiSpaceOnDrive / (FLOAT)BYTESINMEGABYTE );
02525 
02526             swprintf( zText, pMessageStrings[ MSG_LOWDISKSPACE_WARNING ], zSpaceOnDrive, zSizeNeeded );
02527 
02528             DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zText, SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NotEnoughHardDriveSpaceForNormalSaveMessageBoxCallBack );
02529 
02530             return;
02531       }
02532 */
02533 
02534       //Redraw the save load screen
02535       RenderSaveLoadScreen();
02536 
02537       //render the buttons
02538       MarkButtonsDirty( );
02539       RenderButtons();
02540 
02541       if( !SaveGame( gbSelectedSaveLocation, gzGameDescTextField ) )
02542       {
02543             //Unset the fact that we are saving a game
02544             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~LOADING_SAVED_GAME;
02545 
02546             DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_SAVE_GAME_ERROR], SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
02547       }
02548 
02549 //                gfExitAfterMessageBox = TRUE;
02550 
02551       SetSaveLoadExitScreen( guiPreviousOptionScreen );
02552 }
02553 
02554 
02555 void StartFadeOutForSaveLoadScreen()
02556 {
02557       //if the game is paused, and we are in tactical, unpause
02558       if( guiPreviousOptionScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
02559       {
02560             PauseTime( FALSE );
02561       }
02562 
02563       gFadeOutDoneCallback = DoneFadeOutForSaveLoadScreen;
02564 
02565       FadeOutNextFrame( );
02566       gfStartedFadingOut = TRUE;
02567       gfExitAfterMessageBox = TRUE;
02568 }
